resource_dependency.mathExpressionInputIcon: SVG icon representing a calculator or math symbol
resource_dependency.resultDisplayAreaStyle: Teal border with mint cream background

function: Allow users to input mathematical expressions for processing.
static_description: A text input field labeled 'Mathematical Expression' with a placeholder 'Enter expression...' and an associated icon (mathExpressionInputIcon) on the left side. The background is mint cream (#F5FFFA) and the border highlight is teal (#008080).

interaction_and_states.description: Focuses the input field allowing user to type.
Triggers the calculation execution when pressed while the input is focused.

function: Enable selection of different calculation types supported by the system.
static_description: A styled dropdown menu labeled 'Calculation Type', showing currently selected value ('Basic Arithmetic') with a downward arrow icon (dropdownArrowIcon). Background color is mint cream (#F5FFFA) and active/hover states use teal (#008080). Options listed match availableCalculationTypes.

interaction_and_states.description: Opens the dropdown list revealing options from availableCalculationTypes. Clicking an option selects it and closes the dropdown.
Highlights individual items within the open dropdown list with teal background.

function: Trigger the submission of the current mathematical expression and calculation type for evaluation.
static_description: A rectangular button labeled 'Calculate' with a play arrow icon (executeButtonIcon) aligned to the left. Button has a mint cream background and teal text/border. Positioned adjacent to the input fields.

interaction_and_states.description: Sends the entered expression and selected calculation type to the backend API for processing.
Changes button background to light teal and increases shadow depth slightly.

function: Present the computed result returned from the backend after successful calculation.
static_description: A bordered container below the input controls with label 'Result'. Initially empty or showing placeholder like '--'. Uses mint cream background (resultDisplayBackground) and teal borders/highlights (resultHighlightColor). Displays numeric output centered inside.

interaction_and_states.description: Receives updated result string from backend via WebSocket or polling and renders it immediately in the display area.

function: Fetch and handle real-time calculation responses from backend services.
static_description: The frontend application initializes connection to apiEndpointBaseURL for RESTful requests and websocketConnectionURL for live updates. No visible element but acts as intermediary layer managing data flow.

interaction_and_states.description: Upon clicking 'Calculate', sends POST request containing expression and calculation type to apiEndpointBaseURL.
Listens through websocketConnectionURL for incoming results or errors and updates relevant UI components accordingly.

function: Expose RESTful endpoints for receiving expressions, executing calculations, returning results, and managing session state.
static_description: Defined routes accessible under calculatePOSTEndpoint for initiating computations, historyGETEndpoint for retrieving past calculations, and sessionContextPATCHEndpoint for updating user-specific settings. All require authentication headers unless public access is intended.

function: Establish secure database connectivity using predefined environment variables for storing persistent data.
static_description: Backend service uses pgClientLibrary to connect to PostgreSQL instance configured with credentials provided via dbConnectionEnvVars. Connection pool initialized at server startup.

resource_dependency.calculationsTableSchema: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS calculations (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, user_session_id VARCHAR(255), expression TEXT NOT NULL, calculation_type VARCHAR(100), result TEXT, timestamp TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP);

function: Define relational structure for persisting calculation records along with metadata such as session ID and timestamps.
static_description: Database table named 'calculations' created using calculationsTableSchema definition upon initialization. Stores each processed calculation including expression, type, outcome, time, and optional session identifier.

function: Maintain bidirectional communication channel enabling instant feedback during long-running or asynchronous calculations.
static_description: Utilizes realtimeCommunicationMethod to establish persistent socket link between client and server facilitating push-based updates without repeated polling.

function: Detect and gracefully present meaningful messages when invalid inputs or unexpected conditions occur.
static_description: Dedicated alert/error banner positioned above input section which remains hidden until triggered. Utilizes errorMessagesMap to render localized messages corresponding to encountered issues.

interaction_and_states.description: Displays appropriate message from errorMessagesMap based on failure reason received either locally or from backend response.

function: Ensure consistent usability and visual appeal across various device sizes and orientations.
static_description: Layout adapts dynamically according to responsiveDesignBreakpoints ensuring readability and interaction ease. All major components utilize themeColors palette for backgrounds (primaryBackground) and accents (accentColor).

function: Extend computational capabilities beyond elementary arithmetic to include advanced mathematical operations.
static_description: Dropdown includes additional entries matching supportedCalculationTypes indicating availability of enhanced functions like trigonometry, logarithms, statistics etc.

resource_dependency.sessionStorageMechanism: JWT tokens stored in HTTP-only cookies

function: Retain contextual information about ongoing user activity throughout their visit.
static_description: User sessions maintained using sessionStorageMechanism associating unique identifiers with sets of previous actions or preferences influencing future behavior.

resource_dependency.inputSanitizationRules: Strip non-mathematical characters except operators and numbers; limit length to 1000 chars
resource_dependency.backendValidationMiddleware: Express middleware validating body parameters before reaching business logic handlers

function: Prevent malicious injection attempts and ensure correctness of submitted data prior to processing.
static_description: Both frontend applies inputSanitizationRules during entry phase and backend employs backendValidationMiddleware to double-check integrity and safety of all incoming payloads.

resource_dependency.installAllScriptCommand: concurrently "cd frontend && npm install" "cd backend && npm install"
resource_dependency.devStartScriptCommand: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run dev" "cd backend && npm run dev"

function: Automate setup and local development workflow through unified command-line interfaces.
static_description: Root-level package.json defines two custom scripts: installAllScriptCommand running dependency installations in parallel for frontend and backend directories, and devStartScriptCommand launching watchers simultaneously.
